replies.msg:
Gareth Bale's agent, Jonathan Barnett, has spoken of the Welshman's determination to succeed in his career - admitting that his desire to be the best is the reason why the winger's â€‹Real Madrid future is in doubt.

Bale put the likes of â€‹Manchester United on red alert a few weeks ago, merely minutes after scoring an incredible brace to secure Los Blancos the Champions League. He admitted that his future is uncertain following a tough season, hinting that this summer could see a change of clubs.
FBL-EUR-C1-LIVERPOOL-REAL MADRID
And now his agent has opened up on the situation, explaining that he has yet to speak with the club about his future. He's also suggested why Bale might have to leave the Spanish capital.

â€‹"I think we have to talk to Real Madrid and see where that will take us," began Barnett, via Mundo Deportivo. "He wants to live a better course than last season, he wants to play more and it's important for him. I think he's one of the three or four best players in the world."
